title: Genesis Chapter 42 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 42 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: What did Joseph do in Genesis 42:25?
options: Commanded to fill their sacks with corn
questions.correctAnswer: Commanded to fill their sacks with corn
questions.explanation: Genesis 42:25 states: "Then Joseph commanded to fill their sacks with corn, and to restore every man's money into his sack, and to give them..."

questions.question: Who said "Lest peradventure mischief befall him" in Genesis 42:4?
questions.explanation: Genesis 42:4 states: "But Benjamin, Joseph's brother, Jacob sent not with his brethren; for he said, Lest peradventure mischief befall him."

questions.question: According to Genesis 42:6, who was the governor over the land?
questions.explanation: Genesis 42:6 states: "And Joseph was the governor over the land, and he it was that sold to all the people of the land: and Joseph's brethr..."

questions.question: According to Genesis 42:7, who saw his brethren?

questions.question: Who said "unto them, Ye are spies; to see the nakedness of the land ye are come" in Genesis 42:9?
questions.explanation: Genesis 42:9 states: "And Joseph remembered the dreams which he dreamed of them, and said unto them, Ye are spies; to see the nakedness of ..."

questions.question: According to Genesis 42:14, who said unto them?
questions.explanation: Genesis 42:14 states: "And Joseph said unto them, That is it that I spake unto you, saying, Ye are spies:"

questions.question: Who said "Ye are spies:" in Genesis 42:14?
questions.explanation: Genesis 42:14 states: "And Joseph said unto them, That is it that I spake unto you, saying, Ye are spies:"

questions.question: According to Genesis 42:18, who said unto them the third day?
questions.explanation: Genesis 42:18 states: "And Joseph said unto them the third day, This do, and live; for I fear God:"

questions.explanation: Genesis 42:18 states: "And Joseph said unto them the third day, This do, and live; for I fear God:"

questions.question: Who said "Spake I not unto you, saying, Do not sin against the child; and ye would not ..." in Genesis 42:22?
questions.explanation: Genesis 42:22 states: "And Reuben answered them, saying, Spake I not unto you, saying, Do not sin against the child; and ye would not hear? ..."

questions.question: In Genesis 42:3, Jacob went down to buy corn in Egypt.
questions.explanation: This is false. It was Joseph, not Jacob, who went down to buy corn in Egypt. Genesis 42:3 states: "And Joseph's ten brethren went down to buy corn in Egypt."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 42:1: "Now when ______ saw that there was corn in Egypt, ______ said unto his sons, Why do ye look one upon another?"
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "Now when Jacob saw that there was corn in Egypt, Jacob said unto his sons, Why do ye look one upon another?"

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 42:2: "And he said, Behold, I have heard that there is corn in ______: get you down thither, and buy for us from thence; that we may live, and not die."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And he said, Behold, I have heard that there is corn in Egypt: get you down thither, and buy for us from thence; that..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 42:5: "And the sons of ______ came to buy corn among those that came: for the famine was in the land of Canaan."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And the sons of Israel came to buy corn among those that came: for the famine was in the land of Canaan."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 42:8: "And ______ knew his brethren, but they knew not him."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Joseph knew his brethren, but they knew not him."
